title: Erasmusbrug
description: A stunning bridge offering beautiful views and a great place for a walk or bike ride.

title: Markthal
description: A modern market hall with a wide variety of food stands, shops, and restaurants.

title: Kunsthal Rotterdam
description: An art museum showcasing contemporary and modern art in a unique building.

title: Cube Houses
description: Innovative cubic houses offering a unique architectural experience and a great photo spot.

title: Euromast
description: An observation tower providing panoramic views of the city and beyond.

title: Het Park
description: A beautiful park ideal for picnics, walks, and relaxing amidst greenery.

title: Witte de Withstraat
description: A lively street known for its bars, restaurants, and cultural hotspots.

title: Rotterdam Zoo
description: A popular zoo with a wide variety of animals and themed enclosures.

title: Fenix Food Factory
description: A food market located in a former warehouse, offering local products and great food.

title: Oude Haven
description: A historic harbor area with cozy cafes, restaurants, and a great atmosphere.
